title: GET_TRAIN_DIRECTION
content:
0x8DAF79B6// GetTrainDirection
BOOL GET_TRAIN_DIRECTION(Vehicle train);Parameters:train: The train handleReturns: True if the train is moving forward on the track, False otherwiseGets the direction the train is facing
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_TRAIN_DIRECTION
GetTrainDirection(vehicle)
